enum.name: CalibrationResult
enum.int: Use the previous calibration value due to boot time calibration failed.
Use the new calibration value.
Calibration value is not within the speaker acceptance range and use the previous calibration value
Use the previous calibration value as the diff is small

enum.name: CrasA2dpExitCode
enum.summary: List of codes to indicate why Bluetooth A2DP audio session exits the connected state. CRAS side definition in https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromiumos/third_party/adhd/+/main/cras/src/server/cras_server_metrics.h
enum.int: Disconnected while idle. The default exit code without anything special.
Disconnected while a2dp is streaming and audio thread didn't catch any socket error.
Disconnected while streaming and receiving ECONNRESET code.
CRAS request the disconnection because of longer than 5 seconds of consecutive packet Tx failure.
CRAS request the disconnection because kernel socket returns error code that CRAS treats as fatal error.

enum.name: CrasClientType
enum.summary: List of the client type of CRAS. The list can be found in https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromiumos/third_party/adhd/+/main/cras/src/common/cras_types.h (enum CRAS_CLIENT_TYPE).
enum.int: Unknown client.
A client using an old CRAS lib. (CRAS_PROTO_VER = 3)
A client created by cras_test_client.
A client using CRAS via pcm, like aplay.

enum.name: CrasDeviceDspOffloadStatus
enum.summary: List of the device DSP offload status of CRAS. The list can be found in https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromiumos/third_party/adhd/+/main/cras/src/server/cras_server_metrics.h (enum CRAS_DEVICE_DSP_OFFLOAD_STATUS).
enum.int: DSP modules are requested to offload to DSP FW and done successfully.
DSP modules are requested to offload to DSP FW but failed; fallback to disable the offload is triggered and done successfully. DSP modules will run on CRAS then.
DSP modules are requested to offload to DSP FW but failed; fallback to disable the offload is triggered but still failed.
The offload is disabled intentionally by CRAS but failed.

enum.name: CrasDeviceOpenStatus
enum.summary: List of the device open status of CRAS. The list can be found in https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromiumos/third_party/adhd/+/main/cras/src/server/cras_server_metrics.h (enum CRAS_DEVICE_OPEN_STATUS).

enum.name: CrasDevicePair
enum.summary: List of the device pair of CRAS. The value is combined from two device types. https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromiumos/third_party/adhd/+/main/cras/src/server/cras_server_metrics.c (enum CRAS_METRICS_DEVICE_TYPE).

enum.name: CrasDeviceType
enum.summary: List of the device type of CRAS. The list can be found in https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromiumos/third_party/adhd/+/main/cras/src/server/cras_server_metrics.c (enum CRAS_METRICS_DEVICE_TYPE).

enum.name: CrasDlcManagerDlcStatus
enum.summary: Availability of CRAS DLC. This list should be aligned with CRAS: https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromiumos/third_party/adhd/+/main/cras/src/server/cras_server_metrics.h

enum.name: CrasHfpBatteryIndicator
enum.summary: List of known battery indicator supports in Bluetooth Hands-free profile. This list should be aligned with CRAS: https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromiumos/third_party/adhd/+/main/cras/src/server/cras_hfp_slc.h

enum.name: CrasHfpCodec
enum.summary: List of codec ids used for SCO audio, in Bluetooth Hands-free profile. This list should be aligned with CRAS: https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromiumos/third_party/adhd/+/main/cras/src/server/cras_hfp_slc.h

enum.name: CrasHfpMicSuperResolutionStatus
enum.summary: List of status types of Super Resolution for the bluetooth microphone audio. This list should be aligned with CRAS: https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromiumos/third_party/adhd/+/main/cras/src/server/cras_server_metrics.h

enum.name: CrasHfpScoError
enum.summary: List of results(success or error code) of setting up a SCO connection for Bluetooth Hands-free profile. This list should be aligned with CRAS: https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromiumos/third_party/adhd/+/main/cras/src/server/cras_server_metrics.h

enum.name: CrasHfpTelephonyEvent
enum.summary: List of Bluetooth hfp telephony events from Floss sent to CRAS. CRAS side definition in https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromiumos/third_party/adhd/+/main/cras/src/server/cras_server_metrics.h
enum.int: uhid device is opened. This event usually happens when the user enables a Bluetooth telephony HID device from WebHID to start using call control.

enum.name: CrasNoiseCancellationStatus
enum.summary: List of status types of Noise Cancellation for the supported audio device. This list should be aligned with CRAS: https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromiumos/third_party/adhd/+/main/cras/src/server/cras_alsa_io.c

enum.name: CrasStreamAddError
enum.summary: List of errors could happen when CRAS adds a stream to its audio thread. Cras side definition in https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromiumos/third_party/adhd/+/main/cras/src/server/cras_server_metrics.h
enum.int: The IO device has encountered error.
Certain arguments are invalid.
Other errors.

enum.name: CrasStreamConnectStatus
enum.summary: List of status when client requests to connect a stream to CRAS. Cras side definition in https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromiumos/third_party/adhd/+/main/cras/src/server/cras_server_metrics.h
enum.int: The requested format is invalid.
The shared memory size is invalid.
Fails to get shm fds.
Fails to add stream to stream_list at CRAS server side.
Fails to send reply to CRAS client.

enum.name: CrasStreamCreateError
enum.summary: List of errors could happen when CRAS creates a stream. Cras side definition in https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromiumos/third_party/adhd/+/main/cras/src/server/cras_server_metrics.h
enum.int: Certain arguments are invalid.
No memory.
Fail to set up shared memory.

enum.name: SoundCardInitResult
enum.int: amp.boot_time_calibration() returns ok.

enum.name: SoundCardInitWaitForSpeaker
enum.int: OK.
Error.
